poem:
Title: "The Unmade Chemist's Lament"

A brilliant mind descended in narcotic haze,
Rapt in Ronkonkoma's crystal maze.
The meth lab's mantras, they would chime,
A Breaking Bad ballad in volatile time.
Defeated, not by clever ruse, but a traitor's call,
Shows even geniuses, can heedlessly fall.
Learn, dear reader, from this tale of the bungled good,
Science, spun awry, more potent than hood.
